body:
Recently, I found a new game called Cube World. I looked into it and thought it was a pretty fun game that I could actually play. I haven't bought it yet or else I wouldn't be asking this question: is buying cube world worth it?

i have already done some research on it from articles to video gameplay on it which makes me really wanna buy it.

i know that there are cracked/pirated versions out there but I dont want my very own person virus crawling around my computer.

Thanks

title: Cube World: Is it Worth it?

replies.body:
Ah Cube world..
I have it, my friend gave it to me :/
But, Cube World isn't worth the money you pay for it, it's the kind of game where it is really easy to get bored of, plus it is a bit of a rip off of Minecraft.
replies.body_tagged:
Ah Cube world..
I have it, my friend gave it to me :/
But, Cube World isn't worth the money you pay for it, it's the kind of game where it is really easy to get bored of, plus it is a bit of a rip off of Minecraft.

replies.body: You also have to have a pretty powerful PC to play it smoothly.

replies.body: I have it. Super boring and very confusing at the beginning.
